name: @tweenjs/tween.js
description: Super simple, fast and easy to use tweening engine which incorporates optimised Robert Penner's equations.

scripts.build: rimraf dist .tmp && node scripts/write-version.js && npm run tsc && npm run rollup-build
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test-unit && npm run test-lint
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch --message 'v%s' && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor --message 'v%s' && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major --message 'v%s' && npm publish && git push --follow-tags

author: tween.js contributors (https://github.com/tweenjs/tween.js/graphs/contributors)
